!Duda-Mara Totem Spirit: ... Didn't I tell you to go away ...! Hmm ... Wait ...! What is that sweet smell? Such a sweet smell comes from that cauldron! The sweet smell of blood ... You are giving this to me? Thank you ...! Mmmm ... mmm ... . So, young shaman of Paagrio, have you come to me to learn the names of the ninety-nine spirits?
